jobs.title: Senior AI Engineer - Computer Vision
jobs.description: We're looking for an experienced AI Engineer to join our computer vision team. You'll be working on cutting-edge projects involving object detection, image segmentation, and real-time video analysis. The ideal candidate has strong experience with PyTorch/TensorFlow, OpenCV, and deployment of ML models in production environments.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in AI/ML development
Strong background in computer vision and deep learning
Knowledge of MLOps and model deployment
MS/PhD in Computer Science or related field preferred

jobs.title: Blockchain Developer - DeFi Protocol
jobs.description: Join our team to build the next generation of decentralized finance protocols. We're developing innovative DeFi solutions on Ethereum and Layer 2 networks. You'll be responsible for smart contract development, security audits, and protocol optimization.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent

jobs.title: RPA Developer - Process Automation
jobs.description: We're seeking an RPA Developer to design and implement robotic process automation solutions for our enterprise clients. You'll work with UiPath, Blue Prism, and custom automation frameworks to streamline business processes and improve operational efficiency.
requirements: Certification in UiPath or Blue Prism
Experience with process analysis and optimization

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer - React/Node.js
jobs.description: Looking for a talented Full Stack Developer to join our growing team. You'll be building modern web applications using React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. We value clean code, test-driven development, and collaborative problem-solving.
requirements: Strong proficiency in React and Node.js

jobs.title: Mobile App Developer - Flutter
jobs.description: We're building the next generation of mobile applications and need a skilled Flutter developer to join our team. You'll be working on cross-platform mobile apps with complex UI/UX requirements and real-time features.
requirements: Published apps on App Store and Google Play
Knowledge of mobile app architecture patterns
Strong attention to detail and user experience

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer - Kubernetes & AWS
jobs.description: Join our infrastructure team to build and maintain scalable cloud solutions. You'll be working with Kubernetes, AWS services, and modern DevOps tools to ensure reliable and efficient deployment pipelines for our applications.
requirements: Strong knowledge of Kubernetes and containerization
Experience with AWS services and cloud architecture
Experience with CI/CD pipelines and automation

jobs.title: Machine Learning Engineer - NLP
jobs.description: We're looking for an ML Engineer specializing in Natural Language Processing to work on our conversational AI platform. You'll be developing and deploying NLP models for text analysis, sentiment detection, and language understanding.
requirements: Experience with transformer models and BERT
Knowledge of MLOps and model deployment
MS in Computer Science, AI, or related field preferred

jobs.title: Smart Contract Auditor
jobs.description: Security-focused role auditing smart contracts for vulnerabilities and best practices. You'll be reviewing Solidity code, conducting security assessments, and providing recommendations for DeFi protocols and NFT projects.
requirements: Proven track record in smart contract auditing
Deep understanding of Ethereum and DeFi protocols
Knowledge of common vulnerabilities and attack vectors

jobs.title: Frontend Developer - Vue.js
jobs.description: We need a creative Frontend Developer with Vue.js expertise to build beautiful and responsive user interfaces. You'll be working closely with our design team to implement pixel-perfect designs and smooth user experiences.
requirements: Strong CSS and responsive design skills
Experience with modern build tools (Webpack, Vite)
Attention to detail and design aesthetics

jobs.title: iOS Developer - Swift/SwiftUI
jobs.description: Join our mobile team to develop cutting-edge iOS applications. You'll be working with the latest iOS technologies including SwiftUI, Combine, and Core ML to create innovative mobile experiences for our users.
requirements: Strong knowledge of Swift and SwiftUI
Published apps on the App Store
Experience with iOS frameworks and APIs
BS in Computer Science or equivalent experience

jobs.title: Cloud Architect - Multi-Cloud Strategy
jobs.description: Lead our cloud transformation initiative across AWS, Azure, and GCP. You'll be designing scalable, secure, and cost-effective cloud architectures for enterprise clients while mentoring junior team members.

jobs.title: Data Scientist - Predictive Analytics
jobs.description: We're seeking a Data Scientist to build predictive models and analytics solutions for our business intelligence platform. You'll work with large datasets to uncover insights and develop machine learning models for forecasting and optimization.
requirements: Experience with ML algorithms and model evaluation
MS/PhD in Data Science, Statistics, or related field

applications.coverLetter: I'm excited about this AI Engineer position as it aligns perfectly with my expertise in computer vision and deep learning. With 6+ years of experience building production ML systems, I'm confident I can contribute immediately to your team's success.
Your DeFi protocol project is exactly what I've been looking for. I have extensive experience with Ethereum development and have built several successful DeFi applications with high TVL.
I'm passionate about building modern web applications and would love to contribute to WebCraft Studio's innovative projects. My experience with React and Node.js makes me a great fit for this role.
I'm excited about the Flutter development opportunity at TechCorp. With multiple published apps and expertise in cross-platform development, I can deliver high-quality mobile solutions.
I'm interested in the DevOps Engineer position and believe my Kubernetes and AWS expertise would be valuable to CloudNine Systems. I've successfully managed large-scale deployments.

messages.content: Hi! I'm very interested in your AI Engineer position. I have extensive experience with computer vision and would love to discuss how I can contribute to your project.
Thank you for your interest! I reviewed your profile and I'm impressed with your background. Could you tell me more about your experience with real-time object detection?

Absolutely! I've built several real-time object detection systems using YOLO and custom CNN architectures. In my recent project, I achieved 95% accuracy with 30+ FPS processing on edge devices. I'd be happy to share more details in a call.
Hello! I saw your blockchain developer posting and I'm very excited about the DeFi protocol work. I have deep experience with Ethereum and have audited multiple DeFi contracts.
Great to hear from you! Security is our top priority. Can you walk me through your approach to smart contract security and gas optimization?
Hi Emily! We'd like to schedule an interview for the Full Stack Developer position. Are you available this week for a technical discussion?
Hi! Yes, I'm very interested and available for an interview. I'm free Tuesday through Thursday afternoons. What time works best for your team?
